text:
"Mario Super Sluggers", known in Japan as, is a Mario sports game for the Wii. It was a sequel to Mario Superstar Baseball. It released in Japan and North America, but was never released in Europe and Australia Due To The Limited Release Of the game.
Reviews.
The game got average to good reviews. The game got a 69/100 from Metacritic, and a 7.4/10 from IGN.
